thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 13 of 1692
thread.title: Bruno

author: Bruno
title: Bruno
text:
They have a good prices but when they cancel my flight it took 4 phone calls with total 4 hours on the phone with no satisfactory at the end,I decided for full refund-what caused me a lot of problems,and they told me
That It is going to take 6-8 weeks to get my money back??What a service.2 times they told me that they going to call me within 24 to 48 hours - nothing happend-no respond.
That is my experience-still waiting for my full refund
Have a nice day
